oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion and performance - Divided and United: the Songs of the Civil War - 2013-11-17
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance and panel discussion about the album "Divided and United: The Songs of the Civil War" from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 17, 2013.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Ridley; Randall Poster; Bryan Sutton; Stuart Duncan; Lee Ann Womack;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Discussion moderated by Jim Ridley. Participants include album project supervisor Randall Poster, guitarist Bryan Sutton, fiddle player Stuart Duncan and singer Lee Ann Womack. Includes selected recorded audio segments. Performances include; The Legend Of The Rebel Soldier (Lee Ann Womack) -- Listen To The Mockingbird (Lee Ann Womack and Stuart Duncan) -- Hell's Broke Loose In Georgia (Bryan Sutton and Stuart Duncan).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Ridley, Jim; Poster, Randall; Sutton, Bryan; Duncan, Stuart; Womack, Lee Ann; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
